short_description: Space-Saving Design for Cozy Homes: Perfect for apartments, dorms, and small spaces, Angetra's compact cat scratching board (17.6" L × 7.8" W × 1.18" H) delivers big cat satisfaction without bulky cat trees. Double-Sided & Durable for Multi-Cat Households: This cat scratcher cardboard is built tough! Flip it over when one side wears down – doubling its usable life. Made from heavy-duty, 100% recycled corrugated cardboard, it withstands even the sharpest claws from multiple cats. Get more scratch for your cash with this long-lasting cat cardboard scratcher

Purrfectly Safe & Eco-Conscious Material: Rest easy knowing our cat scratch pad uses only pet-safe, non-toxic materials. The sturdy corrugated cardboard and even the binding glue are 100% natural and environmentally friendly. It’s the healthy, responsible choice for your beloved indoor cats

Essential for Cat Health & Happy Lounging: Satisfy your cat's natural instinct to scratch! Daily use of this cat scratch board helps kittens and cats maintain claw health, shed old nail sheaths, relieve stress, and get vital stretching. Bonus? Its low-profile curve design naturally becomes a comfy lounge spot after playtime or the zoomies

Furniture Savior & Portable Scratch Solution: Protect your precious sofas, chairs, curtains, and woodwork! Angetra's scratching pad effectively redirects clawing urges away from your decor. The lightweight design (includes 2 pads + catnip) also makes it ideal for travel, vet visits, or creating instant cat scratchers for indoor cats in temporary spaces. Keep claws happy anywhere
